Hi Friends,

I have JUnit tests suite out of which some suites take about 10 - 15 
minutes to run and some take 1 -2 minutes to run.

My doubt is that because the tests run one after another and not 
simultaneously they have to wait for the longer tests to finish first 
before they can start next less time consuming tests.

Is there any way that I can run these tests simultaneously for eg. 
Test 1 takes 10 minutes and Test 2 takes 5 minutes, presently this 
will take about 15 minutes total. Is there a way that I can finish 
both these tests in 10 minutes (max time taken by Test 1)?

I hope I made sense if not please let me know I will try to be more 
specific.
